title: The boilers shall be installed in a fire-resisting room of 4 hours' fire resistance rating situated on the periphery of the basement
clause_text: The boilers shall be installed in a fire-resisting room of 4 hours' fire resistance rating situated on the periphery of the basement. Catch-pitch shall be provided at the low level. Entry to this room shall be provided with a composite door of two hoursâ€™ fire resistance.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The boilers shall be installed in a fire-resisting room of 4 hours' fire resistance rating situated on the periphery of the basement. Catch-pitch shall be provided at the low level.
